Package org.sindice.siren.analysis.filter

Token's filters used for term processing, URI processing and JSON indexing.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ASCIIFoldingExpansionFilter
    This class converts alphabetic, numeric, and symbolic Unicode characters which are not in the first 127 ASCII characters (the "Basic Latin" Unicode block) into their ASCII equivalents, if one exists.
    AssignTokenTypeFilter Deprecated
    DatatypeAnalyzerFilter
    This class performs post-processing operation on the tokens extracted by JsonTokenizer based on the DatatypeAttribute.
    MailtoFilter
    Split an URI with a mailto scheme.
    PayloadCodec
    Abstract class implementation of the SIREn payload coder/decoder.
    PositionAttributeFilter
    Filter that encode the position relative to the node of each token into the PositionAttribute.
    SirenPayloadFilter
    Filter that encodes the NodeAttribute and the PositionAttribute into the PayloadAttribute.
    TokenTypeFilter Deprecated
    URIDecodingFilter
    Decode the URI encoding format of special characters such as '?' or '<'.
    URILocalnameFilter
    Extract the localname of an URI, and break it into smaller components based on delimiters, such as uppercase or integers.
    URINormalisationFilter
    Break an URI into smaller components based on delimiters, such as ':', '/', etc.
    URITrailingSlashFilter
    Filter that removes the trailing slash of the URI token.
    VIntPayloadCodec
    An implementation of the PayloadCodec using Variable Int encoding.

Package org.sindice.siren.analysis.filter Description

Token's filters used for term processing, URI processing and JSON indexing.

Introduction

This package contains a number of token's filters that are used to pre-process URI tokens or to index JSON data.

JSON Indexing

  • DatatypeAnalyzerFilter analyzes the token given its datatype.
  • PositionAttributeFilter computes the relative position of the token within a node.
  • SirenPayloadFilter encodes the node information into the token payload.

URI Processing

  • URIDecodingFilter decodes special URI characters.
  • URILocalnameFilter extracts the local name of a URI.
  • URINormalisationFilter breaks an URI into smaller components.
  • URITrailingSlashFilter removes the trailing slash of a URI.
  • MailtoFilter extracts the mail address from a mailto URI scheme.

Term Processing

  • ASCIIFoldingExpansionFilter expands tokens containing diacritical mark and other special characters.
